channel.title: ~help me with my server!~
channel.description:
HELLO! I am currently in construction of Drigerscape!! This is my first server, and i know NOTHING about coding my server. :|
i need help adding new npc's and making them say what i want them to... also, what file does all of this fall under? I have the server source of Pimpscape.
*ps* YOU CAN BENEIFIT FROM HELPING ME!! If you help me enough to where i can understand it, and it's easy enough to where i can do it, you can have a free mod spot on my server! (Please go step by step, remember i'm a newbie!!) :P
